title: Perform Long Division
text: Write it as a long division problem.
speech: Write it as a long division problem.
pacedSpeech: Write it as a long division problem.

title: Executing Long Division
text: Divide $$d^2$$ by $$d$$. Put the answer, $$d$$, in the quotient over the $$d$$ term. Multiply $$d$$ times $$d+2$$. Line up the like terms. Subtract and then bring down the next term.
speech: Divide  d squared  by  d . Put the answer,  d , in the quotient over the  d  term. Multiply  d  times  d plus 2 . Line up the like terms. Subtract and then bring down the next term.
pacedSpeech: , in the quotient over the   d
. Line up the like terms. Subtract and then bring down the next term.

title: Finishing Long Division
text: Divide $$6d$$ by $$d$$. Put the answer, $$6$$, in the quotient over the $$12$$ term. Multiply $$6$$ times $$d+2$$. Line up like terms.
speech: Divide  6 d  by  d . Put the answer,  6 , in the quotient over the  12  term. Multiply  6  times  d plus 2 . Line up like terms.

title: Answer to Long Division
text: What is the result of the long division?
speech: What is the result of the long division?
pacedSpeech: What is the result of the long division?
